title: Polar ice tests show greater human impact on emissions
text:
Polar ice tests show greater human impact on emissions 12:36pm GMT - 01:48 
UK-based scientists have directly observed living bacteria in polar ice and snow, the first time this has been done. The research challenges previous established thinking that the Antarctic environment is sterile. Jim Drury has more.
